components.title: Describe the planned activities or services that will take place at the asset

components.name: YbfbSC
components.title: Describe anything that might prevent people from using the asset or participating in its running
components.hint: For example, membership costs or eligibility criteria

components.name: KuhSWw
components.title: Tell us how you'll make your project accessible and inclusive to everyone in the community
components.hint: This includes considering people with protected characteristics, disability access needs, and making the space attractive to everyone

components.name: bkJsiO
components.title: Describe how the project will bring people together from all over the community

components.name: dHyMmB
components.content:
• planned services or activities taking place at the asset
  • what might prevent people from using the asset
  • how you will make your project accessible to everyone
  • how the project will bring the community together

name: Apply for funding to save an asset in your community
